name: Mind's Noise #1
description:
#1 in “Mind's Noise” Collection

The sea of creativity and possibilities lies in our mind. 

Our subconscious mind is a powerful force to be reckoned with. It makes up around 95% of our brain power and handles everything our body needs to function properly, from eating and breathing to digesting and making memories. It's a very strange being when you think about.

But our minds are never at rest. In today’s society, finding a quietness is difficult. There are even psychological reviews that discuss the effects of outside noise and whole body vibrations on things like cognition and performance, suggesting that the lack of silence can be counterproductive. This creates mental/mind noise. 

But if we make them silent for a few moment then we will bring more positivity and remove all sort of darkness/negativity from our lives.
